channel.title: [317/562] VintageRS - Where you're destiny lies. All SKILLS, ManyCustoms, & MORE
channel.description:
Hello there, We are here today to introduce the official release of (VintageRS) Aka (VintageRSPS) This is a professionally, wonderfully coded server, 317/562 Gameplay with a lot of features, adventure and fun. Our server has been professionally coded and crafted to your needs. We have a lot of content on our server, Starting from; [CODE] Bosses, Custom Bosses, Tele's Custom Tele's Custom Area's PVP Area's PK Area's PVM Area's FUNPK, DICING, DICEZONE, HELPZONE, DONORZONE, DONORBENEFITS, DoubleEXP events, Custom Items, Colored Items, Custom Npc's Custom Chest's Prestiging, HighScores, 120 SKILLING, and so much more! We have a fully developed; Webcliet, Desktop client, Website and Fourms. We are (24/7 365) VPS Hosted. We Always Have Weekly Updates. Weekly News. Still New, Looking to thrive! Looking for loyal players and staff! We only strive for perfection! [/CODE] ================================================================
Here are some of our Server contents below; [CODE] The Server Features Include... -602 Skill Interface -Fading Hitmarks -Added Working Leech Spec and ALL Saps Curses. -Combat Icons Next to Damage -Dungeoneering FLAWLESS (8 GOOD Floors) -All Important Summoning Special Attacks -Very Advanced Dicing System -10Man "Raid" Style Bosses -Nomad -Introduction of Red Dragons, Very Active Pking -Wilderness Revernants -Custom PK'ing Skill -Elite Slayer Tasks -All NPC's around the World -More Advanaced Skilling than PI -FULLY working Overloads 100% RS -39 Jad Waves, Custom -Unique Custom Home -Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging! -100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Torva, Primal, Virtus, Zuriel, Morrigan and much more..)! -PKP Shops -97% Corrected Item Stats -Even More NPC Anims Added -Player Owned Shops -Sarabrew doesnt drain stats when overloaded -PERFECT Bridding / Switching -Vote4Cash Integrated -Fully Webclient Ready -Soulwars Cape & More Items Added -Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect's) -Critical Hits (With RS Hitsplat) -Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated -Instant Loading (Was very slow with base) -Ring of Life & Slayer Helmet Effects -Brilliant Custom Designed Interfaces -317 Classic RS Graphics -Custom Desgined GWD with Interfaces -NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE -Working Spirit Shield Effects -Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects -Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields -NO DUPES, ALL BUGS FIXED 99% -602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters -Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother! -Donaters FUNPK Area -Perfect RS Hand Cannon Fixed Anti Leech (Commented out Exploding) -Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP -Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server -Near Flawless Combat System -Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow -Real RS Dung Teleport /w Kinship Ring -Dungeoneering is by far the most advanced from ANY server! -Working and Completely Custom PK Skill (exp from winning in wild) -Real RS Barrage Orb's for non freezing barrages. -Fixed ALL Mem Leaks -Enabled Dupeless Stakeing -100% Server Stability -Still so much more, Join Us Today and find out! [/CODE] ================================================================
Server Details below; [CODE]
Website: www.vintagersps.webs.com RSWClIENT: www.rswebclients.com/client/VintageRS VOTE: www.rswebclients.com/vote/VintageRS Webclient/DestopClient: www.vintagersps.webs.com/webclient [/CODE] ================================================================ Contact INFO; [CODE]
Contact Malimt: malimtrsps@gmail.com Contact Mateusz: mat6eu6sz6@gmail.com [/CODE] ================================================================
Owners/Staff Members; [CODE] Malimt: (Founder, Developer & Owner) Mateusz: (Developer & Owner) Zwarte B33g: (Head-Administrator & Supporter) [/CODE] ================================================================ MEDIA/PICTURES;
[CODE]
http://prntscr.com/4yfnpb http://prntscr.com/4yfnw6 http://prntscr.com/4yfo4i http://prntscr.com/4yfocj http://prntscr.com/4yfoih http://prntscr.com/4yfor0 http://prntscr.com/4yfoxr http://prntscr.com/4yfp8u
http://prntscr.com/4yfqbp http://prntscr.com/4yfs8p http://prntscr.com/4yfsq8 http://prntscr.com/4yft9t [/CODE] Everyone is welcome! Hope to see you all!

item.title: [317/562] VintageRS - Where you're destiny lies. All SKILLS, ManyCustoms, & MORE
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Error connecting to server…and first impression honestly is that this isn’t very “professionally made” as you word it.

-You go to the site where a ghastly webs.com page is staring at you. The media on the page just wants to make you vomit. Words sound good, but if there was true media here …I would become doubtful.

Read full topic
item.source: [317/562] VintageRS - Where you're destiny lies. All SKILLS, ManyCustoms, & MORE

item.title: [317/562] VintageRS - Where you're destiny lies. All SKILLS, ManyCustoms, & MORE
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Don’t want to be rude, but it’s horrible.

The yelling npcs are not necessary, and quite annoying.
The quest tab etc is just spammed with information and doesn’t look organized.
Shops are fine but don’t dump them all inside a building which is also your ‘home’.
Also for your ‘customs’ all that’s really custom are the colored dragon kite shields.
I’d suggest you to make them buy-able with coins as-well to attract any players.

And lastly a ::selfie command is just really retarded in my opinion.

Read full topic
item.source: [317/562] VintageRS - Where you're destiny lies. All SKILLS, ManyCustoms, & MORE

item.title: [317/562] VintageRS - Where you're destiny lies. All SKILLS, ManyCustoms, & MORE
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

Paradox68:

Atleast have the common courtesy of right click the image on your prtscrn page, copying the url, and putting them in image tags? Nobody likes copying a bunch of links just to see your pictures.

I can’t this is what I get: Your attachment couldn’t be saved. This might happen because it took too long to upload or the file is bigger than the server will allow.
Please consult your server administrator for more information.

There’s really no need to be arrogant.

Read full topic
